title: 960 69 "The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!"Transliteration: "Wano Kuni Ichi no Samurai! Kōzuki Oden Tōjō" (Japanese:ワノ国一の侍！光月おでん登場) Aya Komaki Shōji Yonemura Masayuki Takagi January 31, 2021(2021-01-31)
transformers_text: 960 69 The Number One Samurai in the Land of Wa no Here comes Ko zuki Oden Transliteration Wa no Kuni Ichi no Samurai K zuki Oden T j Japanese Aya Ko maki Sh ji Yone mura Masayuki Takagi January 31 2021 2021 01 31 It is revealed that Orochi had the Beast Pirates bomb the Thousand Sunny and destroy bridges to cut off routes to Tokage Port At the port the A kaz aya Nine prepare to continue with the raid on their own knowing they'll never get the opportunity again as it is revealed that the Beast Pirates have burned down Ok o bore Town A flashback to many years ago begins Back then Oden was a well known troublemaker who constantly tried to sail away from Wa no A delinquent from a young age Oden committed several atrocious acts such as starting what would be known as the Harem War where he clashed with several other samurai whose women he stole When he turned eighteen he was disavowed from his father shogun Kou zuki Sukiyaki After being caught trying to steal money from a tea shop by a younger T suru a younger Kin ' em on takes a baby white boar from some thugs and brings it to the Flower Capital to gain money However a young Den jiro a s win de ler at the time reveals to Kin ' em on that the boar's parent is a giant boar dubbed the Mountain God which arrives at the capital and wreaks havoc Having overheard them Oden asks for the baby boar saying he'll settle the matter
tf_idf_text: number one samurai land come zuki oden transliteration kuni ichi samurai zuki oden japanese aya maki yone mura masayuki takagi january reveal orochi beast pirate bomb thousand sunny destroy bridge cut route tokage port port kaz aya nine prepare continue raid know theyll never get opportunity reveal beast pirate burn bore town flashback many year ago begin back oden well know troublemaker constantly try sail away delinquent young age oden commit several atrocious act start would know harem war clash several samurai whose woman steal turned eighteen disavow father shogun kou zuki sukiyaki catch try steal money tea shop young suru young kin take baby white boar thug bring flower capital gain money however young den jiro win ler time reveals kin boar parent giant boar dub mountain god arrive capital wreaks havoc overheard oden asks baby boar say hell settle matter
